summary: Courtney Bates, the younger sister of Valerie, and her friends go to their condo for a weekend getaway, but Courtney can't get rid of the haunting feeling that a supernatural rockabilly driller killer is coming to murder them all.
cast: Crystal Bernard|Jennifer Rhodes|Kimberly McArthur|Patrick Lowe|Juliette Cummins|Heidi Kozak Haddad|Cindy Eilbacher|Atanas Ilitch|Joel Hoffman|Scott Westmoreland|Michael DeLano|Hamilton Mitchell|Marshall LaPlante|Don Daniel
keywords: rockabilly|teleporting killer|title directed by female|reference to the rolling stones|horror directed by woman
title: Slumber Party Massacre II
